mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure faster image loading and optimize touch elements for better usability on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce image sizes and leverage browser caching to improve page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions, header tags, and alt text for images to enhance visibility on search engines.
userExperienceTip: Consider adding more interactive elements and clearer calls to action to enhance navigation.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form and add a guest selection option to reduce friction in the reservation process.
tips: Implement structured data markup for better search engine visibility.
Improve accessibility features such as contrast and text sizing.
